OHOS::UITimePicker
==================

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`Graphic <graphic.md>`__

**Description:**

Defines the time picker. The time is in the format of “hour:minute” or
“hour:minute:second”. The selected time is highlighted.

**Since:**

1.0

**Version:**

1.0

**Summary**\ 
-------------

Data Structures
---------------

.. raw:: html

   <table>

.. raw:: html

   <thead align="left">

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row748195873093534">

.. raw:: html

   <th class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" id="mcps1.1.3.1.1">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p414568704093534">

Data Structure Name

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </th>

.. raw:: html

   <th class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" id="mcps1.1.3.1.2">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1910699341093534">

Description

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </th>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   </thead>

.. raw:: html

   <tbody>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row590652449093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1245789827093534">

SelectedListener

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p802247034093534">

Defines the listener used by the time picker. This listener is triggered
when an item is selected after sliding stops.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   </tbody>

.. raw:: html

   </table>

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p559946722093534">

void

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1595902266093534">

Sets whether the size of this view group is adaptive to that of all
child views.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1511550209093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1316029473093534">

UIView ()

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1740388979093534">

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1540035545093534">

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p189705083093534">

OnPreDraw (const Rect &invalidatedArea)

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1157216539093534">

virtual bool

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1911416626093534">

Called before a view is drawn. This function is used to check whether
the parent view of this view needs to be redrawn so as to optimize the
drawing process.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p93330593093534">

IsVisible () const

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1884248964093534">

bool

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1776734432093534">

Checks whether the view is visible.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1187609946093534">

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p746783109093534">

SetDragParentInstead (bool dragParentInstead)

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1883426709093534">

void

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p308555692093534">

Sets whether to transfer the drag event to the parent view for
processing when the view is being dragged.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row551053204093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1464750414093534">

IsDragParentInstead () const

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1638671378093534">

bool

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1751007988093534">

Obtains whether the view transfers a drag event to the parent view for
processing.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1647251102093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p270903574093534">

GetRect () const

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1834306945093534">

Rect

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p402929178093534">

Obtains the absolute rectangle area of the view. When the view has
deformation such as rotation, the rectangle area is the intersection set
of the absolute rectangle area and deformation matrix.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1286340351093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p2027423556093534">

GetVisibleRect () const

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p561110375093534">

Rect

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p2020106822093534">

Obtains the visible absolute rectangle area of the view.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1030032532093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p973060139093534">

GetMaskedRect () const

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p140392100093534">

Rect

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1058189675093534">

Obtains the valid absolute rectangle area of the view. The valid area
refers to the area where the view can be displayed. Generally, the valid
area is the same as the visible view area, but they may be different in
the grid layout.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row8803551093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1859190868093534">

GetOrigRect () const

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1319124672093534">

Rect

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p274015618093534">

Obtains the absolute rectangle area of the view.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1058432973093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p991115961093534">

GetContentRect ()

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1341699707093534">

virtual Rect

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1230531498093534">

Obtains the content of the absolute rectangle area of the view. This
area excludes padding.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1543285644093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1951112117093534">

GetRelativeRect () const

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1042039237093534">

Rect

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1958453566093534">

Obtains the rectangular area of the view relative to the parent view,
that is, the rectangular area relative to the coordinates of the parent
view.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row768853600093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

   <p id="p46596989093534">

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

void

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p2096580390093534">

Adjusts the size of the visible area. This operation may affect the
final display size.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row667680509093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1487721724093534">

SetIntercept (bool isIntercept)

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p303555233093534">

void

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1610433994093534">

Sets whether to intercept the drag event. If intercepted, the view does
not transfer the drag event to the parent view after local processing.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1773533067093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

int16_t

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1142593117093534">

Obtains the view index.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1689576896093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

   <p id="p8823524093534">

   </p>

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1663768546093534">

virtual void

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1606453675093534">

Lays out all child views according to the preset arrangement mode.

   </p>

   </td>

const Style &

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p992948435093534">

style does not need to be modified, which saves memory.

   </p>

   <tr id="row1233605018093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1178290073093534">

GetAllChildRelativeRect () const

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1245471195093534">

Obtains the rectangle area of a new view group after being adaptive to
the size of all child views.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

   <tr id="row1750466080093534">

child views.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

   </tbody>
